skills.name: Legacy Definition
skills.pattern: Code without tests, unclear ownership, fear to change

skills.name: Code Archaeology
skills.pattern: Git blame, commit history, documentation, ask people

skills.name: System Mapping
skills.pattern: Create diagrams, identify components, trace data flow

skills.name: Dependency Analysis
skills.pattern: Map internal/external dependencies, coupling analysis

skills.name: Characterization Tests
skills.pattern: Write tests that document current behavior, not spec

skills.name: Golden Master Testing
skills.pattern: Capture output, compare against approved baseline

skills.name: Seams
skills.pattern: Find places to inject test doubles without changing code

skills.name: Object Seams
skills.pattern: Subclass and override, dependency injection points

skills.name: Integration Tests First
skills.pattern: High-level tests before refactoring, catch regressions

skills.name: Safe Refactoring
skills.pattern: Small steps, run tests frequently, version control

skills.name: Sprout Method
skills.pattern: Create new method for new code, call from existing

skills.name: Sprout Class
skills.pattern: Create class for new functionality, minimal changes to old

skills.name: Wrap Method
skills.pattern: Rename old method, create new with same name that calls old

skills.name: Wrap Class
skills.pattern: Wrap existing class, add behavior without modification

skills.name: Extract Interface
skills.pattern: Create interface for class, program to interface

skills.name: Break Dependencies
skills.pattern: Introduce interfaces, dependency injection, seams

skills.name: Strangler Fig Pattern
skills.pattern: Build new around old, route traffic, retire old

skills.name: Branch by Abstraction
skills.pattern: Create abstraction, build new impl, switch over

skills.name: Parallel Change
skills.pattern: Add new, migrate callers, remove old

skills.name: Feature Toggles
skills.pattern: Deploy dark, enable gradually, quick rollback

skills.name: Hidden Dependencies
skills.pattern: Global state, singletons, hidden database calls

skills.name: Long Methods
skills.pattern: Extract methods, introduce explaining variables

skills.name: Large Classes
skills.pattern: Single responsibility, extract classes, facades

skills.name: No Documentation
skills.pattern: Document as you learn, capture in tests

skills.name: Where to Start
skills.pattern: High change frequency, high business value, high risk

skills.name: Leave it Better
skills.pattern: Small improvements each touch, compound effect

skills.name: Don't Over-Refactor
skills.pattern: Refactor what you need to change, not everything

skills.name: Knowledge Sharing
skills.pattern: Pair programming, code reviews, documentation

skills.name: Building Consensus
skills.pattern: Show value, demonstrate safety, incremental wins

skills.name: Legacy Tools
skills.pattern: IDE refactoring, static analysis, code coverage, dependency graphs
